document.full_text: dennis rodman, known as much for his outrageous behavior as his extraordinary rebounding, defensive skills and five nba championships, was voted into the pro basketball hall of fame on monday.
document.title: dennis rodman headlines 2011 hall of fame class
lines_and_colors: dennis rodman, known as much for his outrageous behavior as his extraordinary rebounding, defensive skills and five nba championships, was voted into the pro basketball hall of fame on monday.
